name: PortableApps forum comments
description: Reduces the vertical space loss on  forum comments of PortableApps.com.

user.name: sharethewisdom
user.about:
I like keyboard navigation, which also makes browsing more pleasant. I find it strange that web developers use so many unnecessary margins and sub menu's. 
That's why I currently (October 2013) use Firefox 23.0.1 with vimperator 3.7.1 and some interesting plugins from here https://github.com/vimpr/vimperator-plugins.

additional_info:
Except for comment header link text color, no colors are changed. This header bothered me.
I use this in addition to this style: http://userstyles.org/styles/60668/portableapps-com-clean
to remove the donate message, add "p.sitewide-news-banner {display: none!important;}"
